name: SUPRACORE
description:
GAMEPLAY

  • SUPRACORE is a base building roguelike in which you defend your core from the incoming waves of enemies.
  • Collect resources and keep them in storage units.
  • Build amazing towers like Flamethrowers, Mortars, Cannons and Machineguns.
  • Collect as many Powerups as you can to make your core stronger.

FEATURES

  • Many structures to research.
  • Powerful powerups that make each run unique.
  • A lot of enemies with different abilities.



THIS GAME IS STILL UNDER DEVELOPMENT SO EVERYTHING PRESENTED ON THE STEAM STORE IS SUBJECT TO CHANGE
